header.title: CosTransactions_Control

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosTransactions::Control interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosTransactions/include/CosTransactions.hrl").

func.name: get_coordinator(Control) -> Return
func.fsummary: Return the Coordinator object associated with the target object

desc.p: This operation returns the Coordinator object associated with the target object. The Coordinator supports operations for termination of a transaction.

func.name: get_terminator(Control) -> Return
func.fsummary: Return the Terminator object associated with the target object

desc.p: This operation returns the Terminator object associated with the target object. The Terminator supports operations for termination of a transaction.
